name: Dark Shards
description:
This is a demo game created for the 144th Weekly Game Jam.

HOW TO PLAY

   -This is a turn based puzzle game. Your goal is to reach the exit after collecting all dark shards.
   -You can choose a direction to move towards with W,A,S,D or the arrow keys or you can choose to switch the state of all lights in the level by pressing 'Shift'. Pressing 'Space' will then end the turn.
   -You cannot move and switch the lights in the same turn!
   -Enemies will not kill you unless your or a shard are in the same tile with it at the end of a turn!
